Source.Name: sox_ng
Source.Summary: SoX (Sound eXchange) is the Swiss Army knife of sound processing tools
Source.Description: SoX (Sound eXchange) is the Swiss Army knife of sound processing tools: it can convert sound files between many different file formats & audio devices, and can apply many sound effects & transformations, as well as doing basic analysis and providing input to more capable analysis and plotting tools.
